20110114040212.000|20110114040215.000|CC1|SARAH PALIN WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR 
20110114040215.000|20110114040218.000|CC1|THE ATTEMPTED ASSASSINATION OF

20110114040231.000|20110114040232.000|CC1|LEVELED AT GIFFORDS AND OTHER

20110114040818.000|20110114040826.000|CC1|USUAL.

20110114040827.000|20110114040828.000|CC1|PRESIDENT NEVER IS ATTACKED SO  
20110114040828.000|20110114040831.000|CC1|MUCH AS WHEN HE SPEAKS.
